sources.name: AlexTheRegent TLD-GameTweaks
sources.description: The Long Dark: AlexTheRegent Game Tweaks

modDefinitions.name: CookingTweaks
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Change time of food prerapation (cooking/burning) or water processing (melting/boiling/drying).

Warning: it does not change displaying cooking time in cans/pots/etc, but it will change once you start cooking!

Important: Adjust values in CookingTweaks.xml!

modDefinitions.name: DetectionRange
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Change animals detection distance. No more wolves who see/hear/smell you from far distance.

Or you can make game more challenging and make wolves to start looking for you if you leave your home ;)

You can also change detection range for rabbits, deers, bears, mooses.

Important: adjust values in DetectionRange.xml!

modDefinitions.name: FasterActionRedux
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Do all actions way faster (nearly instant). Be careful, you can die in blink of eye, if you choose action that is very long (such as harvesting meat from bear)!

Redux of FasterActionMod by felipeds + fixed fishing.

This mod can cause visual bug "item message stuck" (very rare and I've probably fixed it, but who knows). This bug will disappear after change of location.

Also can cause old bug "stuck with bare hands on pickup" (I've probably fixed it too). This bug will disappear only after save restart.

To avoid bugs you can set action speed (container time works fine) to 0.5 (1.0 will be 100% safe) second in FasterActionRedux.xml. This will protect you from these very rare bugs (which I've probably fixed since I've didn't encounter them in 1h).

I highly recommend you to try this mod despite possible bugs (very, very, very low possible bugs), it's pretty amazing and time saving. I can't play without this mod.

modDefinitions.name: MapTweaks
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description: Increase map reveal radius or enable automapping (no charcoal required)

modDefinitions.name: SkipIntroRedux
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Skip disclaimer (autoclick) and intro. Fading removal on main menu is broken, I'll probably fix it later.

Redux of SkipIntro by ossian.

You can configure mod in SkipIntroRedux.xml.

modDefinitions.name: StruggleTweaks
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description: Set chance to instantly kill wolf after struggle or change bleedout time for wolf. Also you can change tap power to save your mouse buttons :)

modDefinitions.name: TimeAccelerator
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Speed up everything in the world to travel faster or do something faster.

Important: adjust values in TimeAccelerator.xml!

modDefinitions.name: TweakRabbits
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Change duration of stun or kill rabbit instantly if hit with rock.

You can configure mod in TweakRabbits.xml.

modDefinitions.name: WeaponCrosshair
modDefinitions.author: AlexTheRegent
modDefinitions.description:
Show crosshair when zooming with stone (enabled by default), bow (disabled by default), rifle (disabled by default).

You can configure settings in WeaponCrosshair.xml.

modDefinitions.name: Developer-Console
modDefinitions.author: FINDarkside
modDefinitions.description:
Enables the developer console, which can be opened by pressing F1
Type help for a list of commands and press TAB to autocomplete.
modDefinitions.changes:
- Scroll down when a command is submitted
- Fixed save, currentSceneName (now called scene_name), and currentSceneIndex (now called scene_index
- Added new pos command to get the current position
- Added new tp command to teleport

sources.name: ShieldHeart Collection
sources.description: Mods of ShieldHeart

modDefinitions.name: RelentlessNight
modDefinitions.author: ShieldHeart
modDefinitions.description: Relentless Night is a gameplay mod for The Long Dark that introduces a new sandbox scenario where the spin of the Earth is slowing down. Slowly but surely, days and nights are getting longer over time, leading to a world with continuously changing temperatures, weather patterns, wildlife populations, and more.
modDefinitions.changes:
- (new) All mod gameplay features can now be customized or turned off individually through the custom game setup menu.
- (new) Indoor environments will retain heat from fires much longer after the fire has burnt out. The hotter the fire, the longer it will keep the place warm. In enclosed buildings, fires will heat the whole house/space and better insulated environments will keep warm for longer.
- (new) Temperature will now affect wildlife populations. Roaming wildlife will be less abundant and harder to find in extreme cold temperatures, but also more abundant in relatively warm temperatures.
- (new) You can now adjust how long fuels will burn in a fire or how long lantern fuel will last while in use. All can be adjusted to provide up to 3 times their regular burn times.
- (new) Fixed bug in vanilla game where loot inside of containers in custom games would generate incorrectly, causing things [like this](). The correct amount of loot will now generate for the associated difficulty chosen in custom mode.
- (new) Fixed bug in vanilla game that prevented custom mode option "Wake Up When Freezing" from working. This feature is now functional and enabled in all Relentless Night games.
- Days and nights get increasingly longer eventually ending in the tidal locking of the Earth and survival in perpetual darkness.
- Temperatures become increasingly warmer/colder with duration of days/nights.
- Indoor temperatures now have a slight correlation with outdoor temperature.
- Blizzards and stronger winds become more frequent as days/nights become longer and weather becomes more extreme.
- Roaming wildlife become increasingly scarce as outdoor conditions become more extreme and harsh.
- Cabin fever affliction is disabled due to the eventuality of long nights and extreme outdoor temperatures.
- Indoor environments can become slightly lit during nights depending on weather and available moonlight outdoors. During the brightest phases of the moon, crafting/breaking of items indoors can become available again.
- Surveying is now possible at night, provided the weather is clear and enough light is present.
- For every additional 1C below a feels-like temperature of -40C, the rate at which the player suffers freezing damage is increased. This effect can accumulate up to a maximum of 5x the original rate at a -100C feels-like temperature and below, do bring a jacket.
- The mod scenario can be played in all sandbox difficulties and can be set up in its own sandbox page. The mod does not prevent playing regular sandbox or other vanilla modes. Relentless night saves are kept completely separate from other save data and cannot be played by regular sandbox mode and vice versa.
- Note: Journal statistics and days survived are still tracked in regular 24-hour days, as if the player is still keeping track with a watch.

modDefinitions.name: RelentlessNight
modDefinitions.author: ShieldHeart
modDefinitions.description: Relentless Night is a gameplay mod for The Long Dark that introduces a new sandbox scenario where the spin of the Earth is slowing down. Slowly but surely, days and nights are getting longer over time, leading to a world with continuously changing temperatures, weather patterns, wildlife populations, and more.
modDefinitions.changes:
- Updated all mod features to work with new Vigilant Flame update.
- Coals can now be added to a fire without a waiting period (late-game balancing).
- More fuel can be added to a fire even if the fire has reached its maximum duration, provided that the fuel can still increase the fire's current temperature. Although the duration of fire will not increase further, the heat bonus will still be applied. (late-game balancing)
- The immediate area where an outdoor fire burned will also retain some heat a while longer after the fire's out, although of course the temperature bonus will drop and disappear much quicker compared to the heat from a fire inside an insulated building.
- Fixed mod bug where failing to start a fire indoors could reset the residual heat bonus remaining inside back to zero in RN's heat retention feature.
- Fixed mod bug where blizzard temperature drop didn't change temperature during blizzards in certain Relentless Night runs.
- Fixed mod bug where the temperature of outdoors caves would sometimes get calculated incorrectly and were warmer than intended.
- Fixed mod bug where custom mode option "Day Length Multiplier" would cause timing issues in RN runs if it was set above 1x. All values of this option can now be chosen for RN runs as well.
- Should you need to correct something in the RN settings later into your game, you can now change specific setting values through new console commands. Loading the save you want to change and entering "rn_help" into the console will provide information on all RN commands needed to change each setting.

sources.name: UberFoX Collection
sources.description: Mods of UberFoX

modDefinitions.name: UModTld
modDefinitions.author: UberFoX
modDefinitions.description: UMod TLD is the first mod for The Long Dark. Currently it has cheats and general gameplay improvements.
modDefinitions.changes:
Updated UModTld to fully support the new features of the December update so it can spawn mooses and heal broken ribs etc etc.
Also added a new command "/custom" that gives you the code for your current custom game just so you never lose it!.

Added various more things to the Config file such as jump settings, ability to show time of day on screen, hotkeys to spawn wildlife etc etc and all kinds of good stuff.

sources.name: Home-Improvement
sources.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes: repair pulled out wooden drawers and use them as containers.

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes:
- Containers that have been repaired with the previous version will return to their unrepaired status and need to be repaired again. Items stored in those containers will be moved to the player's position.
- Repair drawers that have been pulled out
- Repair wooden cabinet doors, including those that have been torn off
- Repairing requires light
- Repairing cabinet doors requires tools (simple or quality)
- Repairing now takes 5 in-game minutes

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes:
- configured more repairable drawers and cabinet doors
- allow many paper items to be broken down to "Crumpled Paper"
- added a blueprint to make tinder from crumpled paper

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes:
Changes:

- prevent moose scratches from being recognized as harvestable paper
- added Russian translation by TheRiddlerRUS

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes: improved detection of removable paper, eliminating a lot of false positive matches

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement

modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes: Allow removing corpses with a right click. This feature can be disabled in the mod settings.

modDefinitions.name: Home-Improvement
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Improve your home by performing repairs and cleaning up.
modDefinitions.changes: Fixed issue with certain corpses not being removable.

sources.name: Instrument-Pack
sources.description: Adds playable instruments and the skills required to play them. Additional songs can be provided as mp3 files.

modDefinitions.name: Instrument-Pack
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Adds playable instruments and the skills required to play them. Additional songs can be provided as mp3 files.
modDefinitions.changes:
Initial Version:
- works with TLD V1.27
- added a playable guitar
- added two likely spawns for guitars
- added two guitar sample songs from Free Music Archive
- users can provide their own preferred music by adding mp3 files



> Extract the contents of the zip into the mods folder.
> For more help, see [Installing-a-Mod](https://github.com/WulfMarius/ModComponent/wiki/Installing-a-Mod)

modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Adds playable instruments and the skills required to play them. Additional songs can be provided as mp3 files.

sources.name: ModComponent
sources.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
updated to work with TLD V1.27
integrated pull request from felipeds, adding support for fire starters, accelerants and blueprint definitions
added support for generic items (like tinder, cloth, etc)
added support for adding items to the radial
added support for new skills (still somewhat rudimental)
added support for reading blueprint definitions from JSON files (similar to gear-spawns)
increased maximum number of servings per food item from 10 to 50
updated template unity project
removed some resource loading patches because that is now handled by AssetLoader

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
added support for stackable items
added support for burnable items
added early validation of blueprints, so problems occur before the main menu and not in the game
fixed issue with unequipping items during a struggle
fixed issue with gamma value initialization

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
Changes:

- fixed scrolling issue in the blueprint list
- added support for LiquidItem (water/fuel containers)
- fixed issue with redirecting assembly loading


> Extract the contents of the zip into the mods folder.
> For more help, see [Installing-a-Mod](https://github.com/WulfMarius/ModComponent/wiki/Installing-a-Mod)

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
- added support for custom inventory categories for items
- set the default category for LiquidItems containing water to "Food"


> Extract the contents of the zip into the mods folder.
> For more help, see [Installing-a-Mod](https://github.com/WulfMarius/ModComponent/wiki/Installing-a-Mod)

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
- updated for TLD 1.33
- added support for additional cooking times ('burnt minutes')
- canned foods will yield a 'Recycled Can' when opened properly
- minimal support for new cooking assets

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes: fixed 'm_WarmUpNearFireRange' so cans won't be opened when dropped far away from a fire

modDefinitions.changes: Added AlternativeAction (binding a right click to interactive objects)

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Library for creating new items and integrating elements into TLD.
modDefinitions.changes:
Integrated contributions from nbakulev and Mackenzie21 to support new item types Bed, First Aid, Tool and new behaviours Sharpenable and Evolve.
Added support for saving item-specific data.

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent

* don't try to spawn gear for the main menu

modDefinitions.name: ModComponent

modDefinitions.changes: Added support for alternative inspect mode models.

sources.name: Sort-Fire-Starters
sources.description: Provides a more practical sort order for fire starters when building a fire.

modDefinitions.name: Sort-Fire-Starters
modDefinitions.author: WulfMarius
modDefinitions.description: Provides a more practical sort order for fire starters when building a fire.
modDefinitions.changes: Sort fire starters first by type (currently burning, normal, requiring sunlight), then by chance to succeed (highest first), then by name.

modDefinitions.name: AmbientLights
modDefinitions.author: Xpazeman
modDefinitions.description: Ambient Lights is a mod intended to make interiors in the game brighter and more reflective of what's going on outside.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated to work on TLD 1.42, also adjusted daytime brightness of lights to compensate for changes made to the interior lighting.

modDefinitions.name: GearDecayModifier
modDefinitions.author: Xpazeman
modDefinitions.description: Mod for The Long Dark to modify decay rates of gear.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated to work with The Long Dark v1.42

modDefinitions.name: KeroseneLampTweaks
modDefinitions.author: Xpazeman
modDefinitions.description: Mod for The Long Dark that tweak kerosene lamps consumption.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated to work with The Long Dark v1.42

modDefinitions.name: WeightTweaks
modDefinitions.author: Xpazeman
modDefinitions.description: Mod for The Long Dark to modify item weights and carry capacity.
modDefinitions.changes: Initial Release

sources.name: Xpazeman Collection
sources.description: Mods from xpazeman

sources.name: zeobviouslyfakeacc Collection
sources.description: Mods of zeobviouslyfakeacc

modDefinitions.name: BreakDownCans
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: A tiny mod that lets your break down a recycled can for a single piece of scrap metal.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: CacheControl
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Lets you decide how many Prepper Caches should spawn in custom mode games.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: Change-FPS-Limit
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Lets you change the game's FPS limit, which is usually locked at 120 FPS.

modDefinitions.name: DisableBreathEffect
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Removes the annoying 2D breath cloud that appears every few seconds when it's cold.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: EnableFeatProgressInCustomMode
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: The v1.29 update turned off feat progress in custom mode games - this mod turns it back on.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: EnableStatusBarPercentages
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: This mod re-enables some labels in the status / first aid screen that show a percentage value of how full the warmth, fatigue, thirst, hunger, and health status bars are.
modDefinitions.changes: Fix condition label position when well fed buff is active

modDefinitions.name: HungerRevamped
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Improves the hunger system by separating hunger and stored calories.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41, added incubation period to food poisoning, integrated Well Fed bonus

modDefinitions.name: InterloperRegionSelection
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Lets you select the spawn region in Interloper mode.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: ModSettings
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: Lets other mods display their settings in-game. This mod doesn't do anything on its own and should only be used as a dependency for other mods.
modDefinitions.changes: Update for TLD v1.41, confirm button now confirms all changed mods, removed obsolete ModSettingsBase#RequiresConfirmation

modDefinitions.name: RememberBreakDownItem
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: This mod remembers the tool you last used to break down furniture. That way, you no longer need to constantly switch from "using a knife" to "no tool" when breaking down branches or curtains.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: ShorterReadingIntervals
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: A mod that lets you research for shorter amounts of time and lets you interrupt research at any time without losing progress.
modDefinitions.changes: Updated for TLD v1.41

modDefinitions.name: WildlifeBegone
modDefinitions.author: zeobviouslyfakeacc
modDefinitions.description: This mod removes most of the animals that would usually roam the world and greatly increases their respawn times, thus making you play The Long Dark quite a bit differently.
modDefinitions.changes: Added setting to enable WildlifeBegone in story mode, bug fixes

sources.name: zeobviouslyfakeacc Collection
sources.description: Mods of zeobviouslyfakeacc
